title: Add identity-access scenario
description: Seed scenario requiring Okta verification, ServiceDesk updates, docs/tickets for cross-system workflow.

title: Audit architecture boundaries and module interfaces
description: Review module boundaries and imports for api.py interface usage; produce findings with file:line evidence and recommendations.
close_reason: Audit complete; findings and recommendations delivered.

title: Add Makefile interface targets
description: Provide setup/check/test/llm-live/deps-audit/all targets with env bootstrap + command wrappers.
notes: Adding Makefile + README instructions for interface contract.

title: Audit build/test contract & CI gating
description: Review Makefile targets, pytest config, dependency/setup expectations, and identify false green/red risks with file:line refs.
close_reason: Implemented and validated with baseline gates/tests

title: Normalize MCP results before tool search filtering in llm test loop
description: run_episode calls call_mcp_tool for vei.tools.search but reads it as dict without normalization, so search matches are often dropped and tool-top-k guidance is ineffective. File: vei/cli/vei_llm_test.py:391-401
close_reason: Implemented and validated with baseline gates/tests

title: Repair Google provider integration (google-genai API mismatch)
description: vei.llm.providers._google_plan uses deprecated API (genai.configure / GenerativeModel) incompatible with installed google-genai. plan_once(provider='google') currently crashes with AttributeError. Update to current Client API and add provider smoke test. File: vei/llm/providers.py:276-280
close_reason: Implemented and validated with baseline gates/tests

title: Package fixes into clean split commits and branch
description: Create codex branch, split into core fixes and formatting/lint cleanup commits, validate gates, summarize naming recommendation
close_reason: Created split commit branch and validated full baseline gates

title: Add ServiceDesk MCP twin
description: Implement ServiceDeskSim with tools (incidents, requests) plus provider registration for digital enterprise flows.

title: Document & test ServiceDesk flow
description: README + implementation summary updates, pytest coverage, and llm-live instructions for new digital enterprise tools.
notes: README/summary updates + pytest + live LLM run.

title: Implement Okta MCP twin
description: Model Okta-like identity data + tools (users, groups, apps) with deterministic simulator and register tools.
notes: Standing up OktaSim with deterministic fixtures + provider.

title: Make check/test gates deterministic and full-scope
description: Makefile check currently lints only new files and mypy only a tiny subset; setup does not install pytest so test target may call global pytest. Align setup/check/test with full-tree deterministic gates and venv-local tooling. Files: Makefile:13-17, 23-44
close_reason: Implemented and validated with baseline gates/tests

title: Backfill docs/tests for new tool pipeline
description: Scenario fixtures, README updates, and pytest coverage for Okta provider + registry search.
notes: Adding README coverage + pytest for okta.* tools.

title: Establish module API boundaries for digital twin scale
description: Current modules import internals directly (world<->router, monitors->router). Define api.py contracts and enforce cross-module imports through module APIs to support scalable Digital Twin Universe architecture. Evidence: vei/world/replay.py:6, vei/monitors/manager.py:5, vei/router/core.py:14-20
close_reason: Implemented and validated with baseline gates/tests

title: Unify tool error semantics (raise MCPError, avoid {'error':...} success payloads)
description: ERP/CRM sims return error dictionaries instead of raising MCPError, making failed calls look successful in traces/scoring and reducing policy signal quality. Standardize error path and adapt server wrappers/tests. Files: vei/router/erp.py:83-205, vei/router/crm.py:53-143
close_reason: Implemented and validated with baseline gates/tests

title: Rename project to Digital Enterprise Twin and merge/sync
description: Update naming/docs with historical Pliny reference, merge PR, rename GitHub repo, sync local main clean

title: Add router tool-provider scaffold
description: Introduce provider interface so new MCP surfaces self-register specs and dispatch without editing router core each time.
notes: Implementing registry helper + provider hook in router.

title: Fix WaitFor success-on-failure bug in behavior tree
description: WaitFor.tick returns success regardless of predicate result (return 'success' if met else 'success'). This can mask unmet approvals/mail conditions and contaminate rollout/training traces. Fix logic and add tests for unmet predicate path. Files: vei/behavior/tree.py:100, vei/behavior/policy.py:31-40
close_reason: Implemented and validated with baseline gates/tests

title: Audit runtime correctness for simulation fidelity in router/world/policy/monitors
description: Review vei/router/core.py and related modules (vei/world/state.py, vei/world/drift.py, vei/policy/*, vei/monitors/*) for concrete bugs or risky behavior impacting simulation fidelity/digital twin reliability. Provide prioritized findings with file:line references.
close_reason: Implemented and validated with baseline gates/tests
